quote: The past cannot be changed. The future is yet in your power.
name: Unknown

quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
name: John Ray

quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Knowledge will give you power, but character respect.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: If you realized how powerful your thoughts are, you would never think a negative thought.
name: Peace Pilgrim

quote: Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Words have no power to impress the mind without the exquisite horror of their reality.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language.
name: Martin Buber

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
name: John Muir

quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
name: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Liberty may be endangered by the abuse of liberty, but also by the abuse of power.
name: James Madison

quote: The power of the lawyer is in the uncertainty of the law.
name: Jeremy Bentham

quote: The best advice I ever got was that knowledge is power and to keep reading.
name: David Bailey

quote: Faith consists in believing when it is beyond the power of reason to believe.
name: Voltaire

quote: Power does not corrupt. Fear corrupts... perhaps the fear of a loss of power.
name: John Steinbeck

quote: Prayer is man's greatest power!
name: W. Clement Stone

quote: Giving money and power to government is like giving whiskey and car keys to teenage boys.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Our scientific power has outrun our spiritual power. We have guided missiles and misguided men.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.
name: John W. Gardner

quote: When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Power tends to corrupt and absolute power corrupts absolutely.
name: John Dalberg-Acton

quote: Rank does not confer privilege or give power. It imposes responsibility.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: Pessimism leads to weakness, optimism to power.
name: William James

quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: We need money. We need hits. Hits bring money, money bring power, power bring fame, fame change the game.
name: Young Thug

quote: I love the sounds and the power of pounding water, whether it is the waves or a waterfall.
name: Mike May

quote: Truth is powerful and it prevails.
name: Sojourner Truth

quote: The world's biggest power is the youth and beauty of a woman.
name: Chanakya

quote: Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence on society.
name: Mark Twain

quote: There is more power in unity than division.
name: Emanuel Cleaver

quote: Kindness is in our power, even when fondness is not.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Knowledge is power.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: When you blame others, you give up your power to change.
name: Robert Anthony

quote: We needed something to express our joy, our beauty, our power. And the rainbow did that.
name: Gilbert Baker

quote: The one exclusive sign of thorough knowledge is the power of teaching.
name: Aristotle

quote: The power of one, if fearless and focused, is formidable, but the power of many working together is better.
name: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

quote: Communism has never come to power in a country that was not disrupted by war or corruption, or both.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: Power always thinks... that it is doing God's service when it is violating all his laws.
name: John Adams

quote: Language exerts hidden power, like the moon on the tides.
name: Rita Mae Brown

quote: I have learned that there is more power in a good strong hug than in a thousand meaningful words.
name: Ann Hood

quote: Never underestimate the power of human stupidity.
name: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: I believe the root of all evil is abuse of power.
name: Patricia Cornwell

quote: The measure of a man is what he does with power.
name: Plato

quote: Personality has power to uplift, power to depress, power to curse, and power to bless.
name: Paul P. Harris

quote: The truth is that all men having power ought to be mistrusted.
name: James Madison

quote: Power is no blessing in itself, except when it is used to protect the innocent.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: The power of an air force is terrific when there is nothing to oppose it.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: We have it in our power to begin the world over again.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: Music has healing power. It has the ability to take people out of themselves for a few hours.
name: Elton John

quote: Never go backward. Attempt, and do it with all your might. Determination is power.
name: Charles Simmons

quote: A king without power is an absurdity.
name: James Monroe

quote: It is certain, in any case, that ignorance, allied with power, is the most ferocious enemy justice can have.
name: James Baldwin

quote: The great gift of human beings is that we have the power of empathy.
name: Meryl Streep

quote: You reclaim your power by loving what you were once taught to hate.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: I believe in the power of great clothing. It can evoke confidence, beauty, and a sense of glamour.
name: Tina Knowles

quote: Nothing strengthens authority so much as silence.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Words, without power, is mere philosophy.
name: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: Nationalism is power hunger tempered by self-deception.
name: George Orwell

quote: The only real power comes out of a long rifle.
name: Joseph Stalin

quote: Power over a man's subsistence is power over his will.
name: Alexander Hamilton

quote: The power of population is indefinitely greater than the power in the earth to produce subsistence for man.
name: Thomas Malthus

quote: Power has only one duty - to secure the social welfare of the People.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I had rather excel others in the knowledge of what is excellent, than in the extent of my power and dominion.
name: Alexander the Great

quote: Words are power. And a book is full of words. Be careful what power you get from it. But know that you do.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: A crown is merely a hat that lets the rain in.
name: Frederick the Great

quote: Mastering others is strength. Mastering yourself is true power.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Truth is the ultimate power. When the truth comes around, all the lies have to run and hide.
name: Ice Cube

quote: Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: The power of community to create health is far greater than any physician, clinic or hospital.
name: Mark Hyman

quote: Having power and being in a position of power can really blur your judgement, and it's not always that clear.
name: Bob Morley

quote: The greater the power, the more dangerous the abuse.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: Unlimited power corrupts the possessor.
name: William Pitt

quote: If you must break the law, do it to seize power: in all other cases observe it.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: Solar power is the last energy resource that isn't owned yet - nobody taxes the sun yet.
name: Bonnie Raitt

quote: With an eye made quiet by the power of harmony, and the deep power of joy, we see into the life of things.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: By giving people the power to share, we're making the world more transparent.
name: Mark Zuckerberg

quote: Few men have virtue to withstand the highest bidder.
name: George Washington

quote: Life has sweetness to it and a beauty and a power that I wanted to celebrate.
name: Valerie Harper

quote: Power is always dangerous. Power attracts the worst and corrupts the best.
name: Edward Abbey

quote: Power ought to serve as a check to power.
name: Montesquieu

quote: Man's greatness lies in his power of thought.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Education is the development of power and ideal.
name: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: The power to question is the basis of all human progress.
name: Indira Gandhi

quote: I believe in one power, and that is the hand of God. I respect all religions.
name: Lata Mangeshkar

quote: The paradox of trauma is that it has both the power to destroy and the power to transform and resurrect.
name: Peter A. Levine

quote: Everyone has a part to play. We have the power. You can do it.
name: Maxine Waters

quote: You can change your world by changing your words... Remember, death and life are in the power of the tongue.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Political power grows out of the barrel of a gun.
name: Mao Zedong

quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
name: Alice Walker

quote: The greatest power is often simple patience.
name: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: Power means happiness; power means hard work and sacrifice.
name: Beyonce Knowles

quote: I believe in one thing only, the power of human will.
name: Joseph Stalin

quote: The power of choosing good and evil is within the reach of all.
name: Origen

quote: What I fear most is power with impunity. I fear abuse of power, and the power to abuse.

quote: Balk the enemy's power; force him to reveal himself.
name: Sun Tzu

quote: No power on earth has a right to take our property from us without our consent.
name: John Jay

quote: I do not wish women to have power over men; but over themselves.
name: Mary Shelley

quote: No man has received from nature the right to command his fellow human beings.
name: Denis Diderot

quote: Power without a nation's confidence is nothing.
name: Catherine the Great

quote: With power comes the abuse of power. And where there are bosses, there are crazy bosses. It's nothing new.

quote: The way to have power is to take it.
name: Boss Tweed

quote: All the waste in a year from a nuclear power plant can be stored under a desk.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: Technology and social media have brought power back to the people.
name: Mark McKinnon

quote: Power concedes nothing without a demand. It never did and it never will.
name: Frederick Douglass

quote: Color is a power which directly influences the soul.
name: Wassily Kandinsky

quote: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
name: Epictetus

quote: The more we deny that we have a dark side, the more power it has over us.
name: Sheryl Lee

quote: If small things have the power to disturb you, then who you think you are is exactly that: small.

quote: One way to boost our will power and focus is to manage our distractions instead of letting them manage us.
name: Daniel Goleman

quote: Never underestimate the power of jealousy and the power of envy to destroy. Never underestimate that.
name: Oliver Stone

quote: Darkness is good. Dick Cheney. Darth Vader. Satan. That's power.

quote: I was now resolved to do everything in my power to defeat the system.
name: Oskar Schindler

quote: Art has the power to transform, to illuminate, to educate, inspire and motivate.
name: Harvey Fierstein

quote: Power is like being a lady... if you have to tell people you are, you aren't.
name: Margaret Thatcher

quote: The power of mathematics is often to change one thing into another, to change geometry into language.
name: Marcus du Sautoy

quote: Owning a great golf course gives you great power.

quote: Leadership is about vision and responsibility, not power.

quote: I don't think people understand the power of social media or our phones.
name: Zendaya

quote: Just try to be the best you can be; never cease trying to be the best you can be. That's in your power.
name: John Wooden

quote: I think the power of persuasion would be the greatest superpower of all time.
name: Jenny Mollen

quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it.
name: W. H. Murray

quote: 'Me Too' is about letting - using the power of empathy to stomp out shame.

quote: The state has physical power and uses it when necessary; the power of religion is love and beneficence.

quote: The coming of honor or disgrace must be a reflection of one's inner power.
name: Xun Kuang

quote: What it lies in our power to do, it lies in our power not to do.
name: Aristotle

quote: Do not put such unlimited power into the hands of husbands. Remember all men would be tyrants if they could.

quote: But to me nothing - the negative, the empty - is exceedingly powerful.

quote: Don't you dare underestimate the power of your own instinct.

quote: My power is the ability to control water molecules and form them into ice.

quote: Biology always beats will power.

quote: What then is freedom? The power to live as one wishes.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: For me, education was power.
name: Michelle Obama

quote: You must never underestimate the power of the eyebrow.
name: Jack Black

quote: The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: I would encourage you: be informed - knowledge is power.

quote: I confess it is beyond our power to awaken the heart, but ordinarily this way does good.

quote: Every addition to true knowledge is an addition to human power.

quote: With great power comes great responsibility. These are platforms with hundreds of millions of people.

quote: If I could have a special power in real life I'd love to fly.
name: Ali Larter

quote: Liberal: a power worshipper without power.
name: George Orwell

quote: Politicians love power. I love freedom. That is why I am not a politician.

quote: I just believe in the goodwill of people, the power of people to do something positive.

quote: You cannot be in a position of power and destroy the life of another person.
name: Pope Francis

quote: Diplomacy: the art of restraining power.

quote: The child supplies the power but the parents have to do the steering.

quote: If absolute power corrupts absolutely, does absolute powerlessness make you pure?

quote: Nike believes in a world where everyone celebrates the power of diversity.

quote: Power is the most persuasive rhetoric.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: Don't let your will roar when your power only whispers.

name: Tae Yoo

quote: With any new medium, the full power is only unearthed with experimentation.

quote: I'm excited to see her power really soar and us have a great time having a great Wonder Woman in our world.
name: Patty Jenkins

quote: The longer I go on, the more I am aware of the power of finance.
name: Justin Welby

quote: The strength and power of a country depends absolutely on the quantity of good men and women in it.
name: John Ruskin

quote: The best people to have power are the ones who don't want it.
name: Kit Harington

quote: Our democracy is designed to speak truth to power.
name: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez

quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.

quote: It is more agreeable to have the power to give than to receive.

quote: Power over others is weakness disguised as strength.
name: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Vision without power does bring moral elevation but cannot give a lasting culture.

quote: To achieve, you need thought. You have to know what you are doing and that's real power.

quote: Feminism is not about girl power. It is about equal power.

quote: Calmness is the cradle of power.
name: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: Every day alive in the 'Power' world is a beautiful day.
name: Brandon Victor Dixon

quote: Today knowledge has power. It controls access to opportunity and advancement.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: Will power is to the mind like a strong blind man who carries on his shoulders a lame man who can see.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

name: Ted Cruz

quote: What connects two thousand years of genocide? Too much power in too few hands.

quote: Social acceptance, 'being liked,' has so much power because it holds the feelings of loneliness at bay.

quote: Creativity is the power to connect the seemingly unconnected.
name: William Plomer

quote: Every single person has the power to change the world and help people.
name: Laura Marano

quote: Power is so characteristically calm, that calmness in itself has the aspect of strength.
name: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: The truths of religion are never so well understood as by those who have lost the power of reason.
name: Voltaire

quote: All gods are homemade, and it is we who pull their strings, and so, give them the power to pull ours.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: The secret of my influence has always been that it remained secret.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: Self-reverence, self-knowledge, self-control; these three alone lead life to sovereign power.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: The only way to predict the future is to have power to shape the future.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: The only legitimate right to govern is an express grant of power from the governed.

quote: The power of historical fiction for bad and for good can be immense in shaping consciousness of the past.

quote: Power is the great aphrodisiac.
name: Henry Kissinger

name: Michael C. Burgess

quote: Circumstances are beyond human control, but our conduct is in our own power.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: The greatest power is not money power, but political power.

name: Booker T. Washington

quote: Concentrated power is not rendered harmless by the good intentions of those who create it.

name: Epicurus

quote: I wanted to prove the sustaining power of music.
name: David Bowie

quote: Getting and spending, we lay waste our powers.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: I just feel that the only power I have is setting a good example.
name: Geri Halliwell

quote: There is no meaning to life except the meaning man gives his life by the unfolding of his powers.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: When every physical and mental resources is focused, one's power to solve a problem multiplies tremendously.
name: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Silence is the ultimate weapon of power.
name: Charles de Gaulle

quote: I associate heavy metal with fantasy because of the tremendous power that the music delivers.
name: Christopher Lee

quote: The classic epic fantasy is good versus evil, underdog against power.
name: Laura Anne Gilman

quote: Sooner or later, man has always had to decide whether he worships his own power or the power of God.

quote: Whatever my aims and agendas were, I never asked for power.
name: Benazir Bhutto

quote: Whoever wants peace among nations must seek to limit the state and its influence most strictly.
name: Ludwig von Mises

quote: Nothing can add more power to your life than concentrating all your energies on a limited set of targets.
name: Nido Qubein

quote: To enlarge or illustrate this power and effect of love is to set a candle in the sun.
name: Robert Burton

quote: The Internet is an empowering force for people who are protesting against the abuse of power.
name: Rebecca MacKinnon

quote: To have what we want is riches; but to be able to do without is power.
name: George MacDonald

quote: There is a power of God for salvation. And it is the gospel of Jesus Christ.
name: Paul Washer

quote: A true king is neither husband nor father; he considers his throne and nothing else.
name: Pierre Corneille

quote: Never allow a person to tell you no who doesn't have the power to say yes.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Force always attracts men of low morality.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: The attempt to combine wisdom and power has only rarely been successful and then only for a short while.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: The reward of one duty is the power to fulfill another.
name: George Eliot

quote: Why do we love the sea? It is because it has some potent power to make us think things we like to think.
name: Robert Henri

quote: Power is what men seek and any group that gets it will abuse it.
name: Lincoln Steffens

quote: Power is not alluring to pure minds.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Except our own thoughts, there is nothing absolutely in our power.
name: Rene Descartes

quote: Leave no authority existing not responsible to the people.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: There is that in the glance of a flower which may at times control the greatest of creation's braggart lords.
name: John Muir

quote: Everything is generated through your own will power.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: Power is my mistress. I have worked too hard at her conquest to allow anyone to take her away from me.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Character is power.
name: Booker T. Washington

quote: All the forces in the world are not so powerful as an idea whose time has come.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: I know the power obedience has of making things easy which seem impossible.
name: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Power doesn't corrupt people, people corrupt power.
name: William Gaddis

quote: He who wishes to be obeyed must know how to command.
name: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: The only difference between the sane and the insane is that the sane have the power to lock up the insane.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Power to the peaceful.
name: Vanessa Hudgens

name: Kanye West

quote: If some people have the belief or view that the Dalai Lama has some miracle power, that's totally nonsense.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: Most powerful is he who has himself in his own power.

quote: Knowledge is power only if man knows what facts not to bother with.

quote: Nuclear power is not a miracle key for the future.

quote: To live happily is an inward power of the soul.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The strength and power of despotism consists wholly in the fear of resistance.
name: Thomas Paine

quote: Odd how the creative power at once brings the whole universe to order.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: A nuclear power reactor is just a fancy way of boiling water.
name: Leslie Dewan

quote: It takes tremendous discipline to control the influence, the power you have over other people's lives.
name: Clint Eastwood

quote: Excessive fear is always powerless.
name: Aeschylus

quote: The power of a close-up can be extraordinary, but you have to have actors who are able to reveal themselves.
name: Phyllida Lloyd

quote: Grammar is a piano I play by ear. All I know about grammar is its power.

quote: When you start to develop your powers of empathy and imagination, the whole world opens up to you.

quote: Whoever is new to power is always harsh.
name: Aeschylus

quote: I'm learning the power of going away for the weekend and keeping myself company.

quote: There is a power in God's gospel beyond all description.

quote: The greatest trap in our life is not success, popularity or power, but self-rejection.
name: Henri Nouwen

quote: It's easier to blame the person with less power.
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: When it is not in our power to follow what is true, we ought to follow what is most probable.
name: Rene Descartes

quote: Power is dangerous unless you have humility.
name: Richard J. Daley

quote: Prestige is the shadow of money and power.
name: C. Wright Mills

quote: What is genius but the power of expressing a new individuality?
name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: He who has great power should use it lightly.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Every reign must submit to a greater reign.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Love is the power to see similarity in the dissimilar.
name: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: I never underestimate the power of hot rollers for your hair and eyelash curlers for your eyelashes.
name: Busy Philipps

quote: A word after a word after a word is power.
name: Margaret Atwood

quote: If England became a world power, it was because of the industrial revolution.
name: N. R. Narayana Murthy

quote: What are kings, when regiment is gone, but perfect shadows in a sunshine day?
name: Christopher Marlowe

quote: There are people in the world who have the power to change our values.
name: John Mayer

quote: The power of storytelling is to free us from isolation, shame, and whatever the situation.
name: Patricia McCormick

quote: I believe the gun has no power at all.
name: Malala Yousafzai

quote: The highest proof of virtue is to possess boundless power without abusing it.
name: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quote: Do not pray for tasks equal to your powers. Pray for powers equal to your tasks.

quote: There's a power in empathy.
name: Tarana Burke

quote: Knowing that you are completely forgiven destroys the power of sin in your life.
name: Joseph Prince

quote: Never underestimate the power of a simple tool.
name: Craig Bruce

quote: We all have a hidden mystic quality if we can learn and trust to tap into that power.

quote: If the power to do hard work is not a skill, it's the best possible substitute for it.

quote: Nobody is as powerful as we make them out to be.
name: Alice Walker

quote: The power of visibility can never be underestimated.
name: Margaret Cho

quote: We pay for power plant pollution through higher health costs.
name: Sheldon Whitehouse

quote: If you are sincere and true to your work, you will be respected. And for me, respect is power.
name: Riteish Deshmukh

quote: Immense power is acquired by assuring yourself in your secret reveries that you were born to control affairs.
name: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Men should think twice before making widow hood woman's only path to power.

quote: Ambition is the immoderate desire for power.

quote: Athletic competition clearly defines the unique power of our attitude.

quote: The soft power of science has the potential to reshape global diplomacy.

quote: People have the power to redeem the work of fools.
name: Patti Smith

quote: The real problem is that the way that power is given out in our society pits us against each other.

quote: To get power over is to defile. To possess is to defile.
name: Simone Weil

quote: Power is poison. Its effect on Presidents had always been tragic.
name: Henry Adams

quote: A man who lives right, and is right, has more power in his silence than another has by his words.
name: Phillips Brooks

quote: There is no force so powerful as an idea whose time has come.
name: Everett Dirksen

quote: Knowledge is the most democratic source of power.
name: Alvin Toffler

quote: Another mode of accumulating power arises from lifting a weight and then allowing it to fall.
name: Charles Babbage

quote: For me, power was never an attraction.
name: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quote: People - running from unhappiness, hiding in power - are locked within their reputations, ambitions, beliefs.
name: Richard Avedon

quote: Next to power without honor, the most dangerous thing in the world is power without humor.
name: Eric Sevareid

quote: In a market economy, however, the individual has some possibility of escaping from the power of the state.
name: Peter L. Berger

quote: The more centralized the power, the less compromises need to be made in architecture.
name: Peter Eisenman

quote: I consider myself a line drive hitter with power. I just try to put my best swing on the ball every time.
name: Albert Pujols

quote: Governance is a way of organizing, amplifying, and constraining power.
name: Rebecca MacKinnon

quote: I consider myself a persuasive person. With the ability to persuade comes a certain level of power.
name: Ertharin Cousin

quote: Knowledge is power, if you know it about the right person.
name: Ethel Watts Mumford

quote: You can't call any one person the devil. Because no one person has the power to be the devil.
name: DMX

quote: Russia needs a strong state power and must have it. But I am not calling for totalitarianism.
name: Vladimir Putin

quote: The people of this country, not special interest big money, should be the source of all political power.
name: Paul Wellstone

quote: It's the Power of the Almighty, the Splendor of Nature, and then you.
name: Al Franken

quote: I think all human beings have a godlike, divine power, only most of us don't tap into it.
name: Ruby Dee

quote: Power, after love, is the first source of happiness.
name: Stendhal

quote: The struggle of man against power is the struggle of memory against forgetting.
name: Milan Kundera

quote: The eye sees what it brings the power to see.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: As I came to power peacefully, so shall I keep it.
name: Corazon Aquino

quote: Washington's impulsive use of power is a danger to America and to the world.
name: Paul Craig Roberts

quote: Every crisis offers you extra desired power.
name: William Moulton Marston

quote: Hydropower is a clean and renewable energy source that provides affordable power throughout the country.
name: Seth Moulton

quote: Vote: the instrument and symbol of a freeman's power to make a fool of himself and a wreck of his country.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: A man's true state of power and riches is to be in himself.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: There is something about inside information which seems to paralyse a man's reasoning powers.
name: Bernard Baruch

quote: In just six weeks from the time the design was started, we had the motor on the block testing its power.
name: Orville Wright

quote: I feel the reason people started using 'me too' is there is beauty and power in those words.
name: Tarana Burke

quote: Order is power.
name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Liberty is not the power of doing what we like, but the right to do what we ought.
name: John Dalberg-Acton

quote: Each one of us has the power to be the change we want to see in the world, making the world a better place.
name: Naveen Jain

quote: In the White House, I had influence. At Breitbart, I had power.
name: Steve Bannon

quote: The most important thing about power is to make sure you don't have to use it.
name: Edwin Land

quote: Power is paradoxical.
name: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quote: The point of power is always in the present moment.
name: Louise L. Hay

quote: Never forget that the most powerful force on earth is love.
name: Nelson Rockefeller

quote: Power and position often make a man trifle with the truth.
name: George A. Smith

quote: The advertisers who believe in the selling power of jingles have never had to sell anything.
name: David Ogilvy

quote: Never work just for money or for power. They won't save your soul or help you sleep at night.
name: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: Our sense of power is more vivid when we break a man's spirit than when we win his heart.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: I cured with the power that came through me.
name: Black Elk

quote: Politics is not about power.
name: Paul Wellstone

quote: Will power is only the tensile strength of one's own disposition. One cannot increase it by a single ounce.
name: Cesare Pavese

quote: An alliance with a powerful person is never safe.
name: Phaedrus

quote: Authority must be respected and chosen wisely.
name: Lech Walesa

quote: Each underestimates her own power and overestimates the other's.
name: Deborah Tannen

quote: Moral power is probably best when it is not used. The less you use it the more you have.
name: Andrew Young

quote: You may not realize this, but people have the power to change the world.
name: Morrissey

quote: No matter what has happened, you too have the power to enjoy yourself.
name: Allen Klein

quote: Throughout history, great leaders have known the power of humor.
name: Allen Klein

quote: Conscience, the power of conscience, can unearth all kinds of things.
name: Ridley Scott

quote: The purpose of getting power is to be able to give it away.
name: Aneurin Bevan

quote: I believe in the power of weakness.
name: Pat Buckley

quote: People who are powerless make an open theater of violence.
name: Don DeLillo

quote: Sir, I am no sycophant or worshipper of power anywhere.
name: Benjamin F. Wade

quote: The only power you have is the word no.
name: Frances McDormand

quote: The power of the people and the power of reason are one.
name: Georg Buchner

quote: America has a critical role to play as the most powerful member of the world community.
name: Adam Schiff

quote: Power in America today is control of the means of communication.
name: Theodore White

quote: The law has no power over heroes.
name: Charlotte Lennox
